scripts.test:debug: cross-env DEBUG=Y HEADLESS=N npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.test:demo: cross-env DEBUG=N HEADLESS=N npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.test:smoke: cross-env DEBUG=N HEADLESS=Y npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'
scripts.uat:demo: cross-env DEBUG=N HEADLESS=N npx wdio config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.uat:smoke: cross-env DEBUG=N HEADLESS=Y npx wdio config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'
